description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tank Negotiator pits you and friends against each other on a floating maze in space! Play Death Match or Capture-the-Flag as you "negotiate" with each others using flamethrowers, ice, earthquakes, sucking vortexes, tesla coils, bombs, lasers, guns and more! Evade your opponents by jamming their electronics, teleporting, or slipping under a cloak of invisibility.
description.short: Tank Negotiator pits you and friends against each other on a floating maze in space! Play Death Match or Capture-the-Flag as you "negotiate" with each others using flamethrowers, ice, earthquakes, sucking vortexes, tesla coils, bombs, lasers, guns and more! Evade your opponents by jamming their electronics, teleporting, or slipping under a cloak of invisibility.
